results.content:
* Low video resolution and poor video quality. Hard to make out what the codes are. Had to screenshot multiple times and zoom in via MS paint to determine if something was a bracket or a parentheses.
* Code appears to be Hackery: instructor debugs his own code frequently due to silly errors. Maybe it's was intentional? Hard to say.
* Lots of jumping back and forth because the instructor forgot to do something beforehand: makes it hard to follow his logic.
* Instructor has bit of an Indian-like accent and does occasionally mumbles.  This makes it hard to determine what he's saying.
* Almost 100% "hows" (for his particularly chosen platform) but next-to-none "whys" style of teaching.

results.content: I have been busy creating my own app based on the information that you provided. It really helped a lot, thank you. I am planning to follow more Angular 9 courses on Udemy. I've got a question: I wrote a service to get info from my database using my REST interface. That works, only the information that is available is not displayed on the view, although I passed it back from the service to the component, re-routing to the same page does not help. Which course can help me best?
